inEndState(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).details: This checks on any halt state, regardless of triggering circumstances
inEndState(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).return: True if contract has halted permanently

inFunding(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).details: This checks on the funding flow happy path, not the fraud path
inFunding(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).return: True if contract is currently in the funding flow else False

inFundingFailure(DepositUtils.Deposit st.details: This checks for the flow, not the SETUP_FAILED termination state
inFundingFailure(DepositUtils.Deposit st.return: True if contract is currently in the funding fraud flow else False

inRedeemableState(DepositUtils.Deposit s.details: Redemption is available from active and courtesy call

inRedemption(DepositUtils.Deposit storag.details: This checks on the redemption flow, not the REDEEMED termination state
inRedemption(DepositUtils.Deposit storag.return: True if contract is currently in the redemption flow else False

inSignerLiquidation(DepositUtils.Deposit.details: This could be caused by fraud, or by an unfilled margin call
inSignerLiquidation(DepositUtils.Deposit.return: True if contract is currently in the liquidaton flow else False

inStart(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).details: This checks on the funding flow happy path, not the fraud path
inStart(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).return: True if contract is currently in the start state else False

inEndState(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).notice: Check if the contract has halted

inFunding(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).notice: Check if the contract is currently in the funding flow

inFundingFailure(DepositUtils.Deposit st.notice: Check if the contract is currently in the funding faud flow

inRedeemableState(DepositUtils.Deposit s.notice: Check if the contract is available for a redemption request

inRedemption(DepositUtils.Deposit storag.notice: Check if the contract is currently in the redepmtion flow

inSignerLiquidation(DepositUtils.Deposit.notice: Check if the contract is currently in the signer liquidation flow

inStart(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).notice: Check if the contract is currently in the start state (awaiting setup)
